titles.title: They rush on the city, they run on wall

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
They rush on the city, they run on wall
For great is the army that carries out His word;
They rush on the city, they run on wall
For great is the army that carries out His word.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Lord utters His voice before His army,
The Lord utters His voice before His army.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Blow a trumpet in Zion, Zion,
Sound the alarm on My holy mountain;
Blow a trumpet in Zion, Zion,
Sound the alarm.
